Source.Name: libdbusmenu-qt
Source.Summary: Provides a Qt implementation of the DBusMenu protocol
Source.Description: libdbusmenu-qt library provides a Qt implementation of the DBusMenu protocol. The DBusMenu protocol makes it possible for applications to export and import their menus over DBus.

Package.Name: libdbusmenu-qt
Package.Summary: Provides a Qt implementation of the DBusMenu protocol
Package.Description: libdbusmenu-qt library provides a Qt implementation of the DBusMenu protocol. The DBusMenu protocol makes it possible for applications to export and import their menus over DBus.
